name: KI-ROO
description:
Dash against the waste below earth and gather energy in order to revitalize the tree that is your home. Be sure to be back on time, though, as tree spirits can't survive being away by night.

Made during the GlobalGameJam in 2023

Pitcher/Musician/Game Designer/Developer:https://github.com/CodingCrate
Developer: https://github.com/snakept
Assets creator: https://github.com/myusome

note: it's unfinished - for now.
